description: Learn the principles behind texture smoothing techniques and build a sample application to implement mipmapping using the Stage3D API.

requirements.knowledge: You should be familiar with setting up and running an OpenFL project based on the Stage3D API. You should also know about 3D perspective projection and 3D cameras. Be sure to read first the previous tutorials in this series on Stage3D (1. How Stage3D works, 2. Vertex and fragment shaders, 3. What is AGAL?, 4. Hello Triangle 5. Working with Stage3D and perspective projection 6. Working with 3D Cameras.
